divs: Sighting DetailsMy brother and I and 2 friends were playing marbles in our yard when a colorfulgas cloud came over us very slowly just passing along at a very slow speed. Wedidnt know what it was. We just thought it was gas but gas wouldnt behave in theair the way this did.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Compton
There were no other sightings in Compton on or around March 31st 1985
